item.dc:creator: troyh
item.content:encoded: "The Guardian":http://www.guardian.co.uk/usa/story/0,12271,1302834,00.html: US Secretary of State Colin Powell described neo-conservatives in the Bush administration as 'fucking crazies' during the build-up to war in Iraq. ... The 'crazies' are said to be Vice-President Dick Cheney, Defence Secretary Donald Rumsfeld and his deputy, Paul Wolfowitz.
